General.Name: Reflectkote Inc
General.Description: Reflectkote, Inc. develops reflective coatings. Its reflective coatings when applied to various surfaces reflect light back as a mirror, as well as protect surfaces from corrosion. The company is based in State College, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 906 South Atherton Street, State College, PA, United States, 16801

2.Name: Mr. Richard  Stefil
2.Title: Pres of Alliance Petroleum Inc and Pres of American Petroleum Products Corp
